# cancelButtonIndex

**Instance Property**

The index number of the cancel button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var cancelButtonIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The button indices start at `0`. If `-1`, then the index is not set.

## Configuring buttons

- **addButton(withTitle:)**: Adds a button to the receiver with the given title.
- **numberOfButtons**: The number of buttons on the alert view.
- **buttonTitle(at:)**: Returns the title of the button at the given index.
- **textField(at:)**: Returns the text field at the given index
- **firstOtherButtonIndex**: The index of the first other button.
